derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French acrostiche, from Greek akrostikhis, from akron 'end' + stikhos 'row, line of verse'. The change in the ending was due to association with -ic

means.word_mean: 1. a puzzle where you fill a square grid with words reading the same down as across
2. verse in which certain letters such as the first in each line form a word or message
